title: Large-Scale Multimedia-Based Autonomous Learning Competency Enhancement Program for University Students

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment configuration for developing autonomous learning competencies in science domains for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans twice weekly or more using multimedia resources.
Learners can complete science-related projects incorporating peer feedback via online collaboration tools.
Learners can organize problems encountered during learning into structured digital portfolios and integrate them into presentation materials.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
